```{r}
age_gender <- dbGetQuery(
"SELECT gender, (t.duration / 60) AS duration_in_min, (2019 - t.birth_year) AS age
FROM trips AS t
HAVING age < 100
AND gender <> 0 
ORDER BY gender, age"
)
```
